description: This source file defines a React functional component called WordCloud that renders a word cloud visualization with animated word sizes and colors based on provided word data.

methods.name: WordCloud({ words, maxSize = 2.6, minSize = 1, accent, primary, secondary })
methods.description: React functional component that displays a word cloud with animated font sizes and colors, based on input words and customizable color palettes and size range.

ctags.name: WordCloud
ctags.pattern: /^function WordCloud({ words, maxSize = 2.6, minSize = 1, accent, primary, secondary }) {$/
ctags.signature: ({ words, maxSize = 2.6, minSize = 1, accent, primary, secondary })

ctags.name: styles
ctags.pattern: /^    <section className={styles.cloudWrap} tabIndex={0} aria-label="Top Words Word Cloud">$/

fields.name: <section className={styles.cloudWrap} tabIndex={0} aria-label="Top Words Word Cloud">
